name: Disciple Tools - Demo Content
upgrade_notice: Keep data in sync with theme changes
author: Disciple Tools

sections.description: Disciple Tools - Demo Content Plugin extends the Disciple Tools system for rapid content addition for training purposes.
sections.installation: (Required) You must have Disciple.Tools Theme installed before using this plugin. Once Disciple.Tools is installed, you can use the normal Plugin system to install the plugin.
